I had the privilege of serving as President of the University of Northern Iowa Freethinkers & Inquirers or just ‘UNIFI’. Our annual flagship event is Darwin Week – a weeklong celebration of science, inquiry, and critical thought. It’s essentially a conference for students on campus and the surrounding community with 3 faculty lectures each day, and a keynote lecture each evening. As part of the planning this year, we decided that our old site was ill-suited to our needs. Thank to the much appreciated design work of Tyler Owen, our site had looked a lot better last year than ever before – but there’s only so much you can do to dress up a very plan Wordpress theme.

Designing And Building With No Free Time
